page.title: 05LEISURE TIME IN CARNOUSTIE
page.content: The adults and children of this area have a wide selection of spare-time interests. There are the usual clubs run by schools and which prove popular with the children. They are the{Gym Club {Chess Club, Netball, Country Dancing and{Football.} Among the most popular evening activities are {Swimming Clubs, Boys' Brigade, {Brownies, Guides, Beavers, Cubs and {Scouts. Weekend pursuits are also quite varied. There are{ballet}classes, {Mini-Rugby}and{horse-riding}at the local riding school. As Carnoustie has a{beach,}it is also popular for{sailing}and {wind-surfing}at week-ends. Several children take{music}lessons and there are the usual evening{ {discos. }
